 201:                             double alpha, double beta,
 202:                             np.ndarray[DOUBLE, ndim=2, mode='fortran'] X,
 203:                             np.ndarray[DOUBLE, ndim=1, mode='c'] y,
 204:                             int max_iter, double tol):
 205:     """Cython implementation of Fast Iterative Shrinkage Thresholding Algorithm
 206:     (FISTA) for elastic-net regression.
 207: 
 208:         The objective function is:
 209: 
 210:         (1/2) * norm(X*w - y, 2)^2 + alpha norm(w, 1) + (beta/2) norm(w, 2)^2
 211: 
 212:     Parameters
 213:     ----------
 214:     w : np.ndarray, shape (n_features,)
 215:         Initial guess for weights
 216: 
 217:     alpha : double
 218:             l-1 regularization parameter
 219: 
 220:     beta : double
 221:            l-2 regularization parameter
 222: 
 223:     X : Fortan-contiguous np.ndarray, shape (n_samples, n_features)
